title: Love's Gonna Fall Here Tonight
text: "Love's Gonna Fall Here Tonight" is a song written by Kendal Franceschi, and recorded by American <a href="country%20music">country music</a> artist <a href="Razzy%20Bailey">Razzy Bailey</a>. It was released in August 1982 as the first single from the album "A Little More Razz". The song reached number 8 on the "<a href="Billboard%20%28magazine%29">Billboard</a>" <a href="Hot%20Country%20Songs">Hot Country Singles & Tracks</a> chart.
